tool_description: Smartly pick 6 numbers from 49 in Lottery Games of Lotto 6/49, across 14 Million combinations.
name: Pick Lotto Numbers
title: Pick Lotto Numbers

api_list.name: Pick 6/49 Lotto Numbers
api_list.description: Lottery games of picking 6 numbers out of 49 has nearly 14 million combinations. This API provides a fast selection of 500 results based on the criteria of Odd/Even ratio, consecutive pairs (twins) and selection from half buckets
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pick-lotto-numbers.p.rapidapi.com/lottoapp/public/api/lotto-result"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pick-lotto-numbers.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://pick-lotto-numbers.p.rapidapi.com/lottoapp/public/api/lotto-result"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pick-lotto-numbers.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
